title: Chapter 4314 - Chapter 4314: Danger 4313, Transforming His Body
body:
Chapter 4314 - Chapter 4314: Danger 4313, Transforming His Body

Chapter 4314: Danger 4313, transforming his body

Translator: 549690339

“He’s moving, at this position!”

When Wang Xian was shuttling through the region of the cross primordial spirit.

At the position above, the heaven’s duty tentacle emitted a luster as it spoke to the spirit kneader and the illusory realm.

When the spirit kneader and the rest heard the words of Heaven’s duty, their bodies moved and they flew towards a certain location.

At the position below, Wang Xian immediately changed his position after performing a divination through the divination lamp.

The spirit kneader and the rest had sent him into the region of the primordial spirit cross. It was obvious that they were going to deal a fatal blow the moment he came out.

This was because it was extremely difficult for Wang Xian to dodge from the region of the Primordial Spirit Cross.

Therefore, this blow was almost guaranteed to hit him.

It could cause him to be severely injured in an instant!

It would be difficult for him to escape after being severely injured.

Therefore, Wang Xian changed his location and flew out!

When Wang Xian flew in the area of the cross-shaped primordial spirit for more than 20 seconds, he stopped.

In the area of the cross-shaped primordial spirit, he couldn’t sense the situation outside. Similarly, the spirit kneader outside couldn’t sense him inside either.

However, Wang Xian still used the divination lamp to perform divination again in order to be careful.

However, what made Wang Xian frown was that the divination lamp showed that he would still be attacked by a powerful force.

“HMM? What’s going on? I will still be attacked if I leave this place?”

Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly. He moved his body and traveled for 30 seconds.

He could only stay in the cross-shaped primordial spirit region for two minutes.

After two minutes, Wang Xian would be attacked by a terrifying force!

He wouldn’t be able to withstand such an attack for long!

Buzz

After Wang Xian flew for 30 seconds, he took out the divination lamp and continued to perform divination.

However, the result of the divination was that he would still be attacked.

This made Wang Xian frown.

“They sent themselves into the region of the cross-shaped primordial spirit because they could lock onto themselves. Things are getting worse!”

Wang Xian’s expression changed slightly!

The spirit kneader and the rest wanted to kill him.

Now, he had a lot of treasures in his hands.

Especially the body of the spirit kneader. It was extremely valuable.

If he were to die, these treasures would be gone too.

This was something that Wang Xian found hard to accept!

This place was too far away from the nine-origin universe. Furthermore, there was the energy interference from the region of the cross-shaped primordial spirit.

He could not contact an lie at all!

Wang Xian kept thinking in his mind. He flew in another direction for more than ten seconds!

Following that, his body moved and he flew out directly!

His flying speed was very slow. He carefully poked his head out!

“Dragon King, you want to escape? impossible. Today, I will bury you here. TSK TSK TSK, I will make you pay ten times the price!”

Just as he stuck his head out, three extremely terrifying attacks came at him.

When Wang Xian saw this scene, his expression changed drastically. He immediately entered the cross-shaped primordial spirit region!

Boom

A tremor came from above!

Wang Xian’s expression was a little ugly!

“D * mn it, he has forced himself into a desperate situation!”

As Wang Xian spoke, his mind was spinning non-stop!

Now, there was only one way!

“That Dragon King has entered the region of the primordial spirit of the cross. He should be able to guess that we can ambush him from the outside!”

Tian dui spoke when he saw Wang Xian entering the region of the primordial spirit of the Cross!

“This fellow probably doesn’t want to leave his corpse to us!”

The illusory realm looked on and spoke as well!

Wang Xian entered the region of the cross primordial spirit once again and didn’t come out. This seemed very normal to them.

This was because if he died in the region of the cross primordial spirit, at least his body and the treasures in his body couldn’t be obtained by the enemy.

If it were them, they would do the same!

“Keke, in order to prevent any accidents, we have been guarding here for a period of time!”

The Spirit Kneader spoke steadily!

He wanted to ensure that the dragon king was completely killed so that he could take revenge.

“Ah!”

At the same time, Wang Xian let out a painful scream in the area of the cross-shaped primordial spirit!

Want to kill him?

It wouldn’t be that easy?

Wang Xian wouldn’t die if he were to knead in the area of the cross-shaped primordial spirit.

He could turn himself into a ten-attribute state.

Although he had been hesitating about this matter and had not prepared for it.

At this moment, Wang Xian had no choice but to take this step!

He would forge himself into a state with ten attributes to escape this crisis.

Then, he would call an lie over and take away all the treasures in his hands.

After that, he would enter the core of the cross primordial spirit!

With this thought in mind, Wang Xian began to tear apart his physical body.

Now, he couldn’t hold on for much longer. He had to act as soon as possible!

Tearing apart his flesh and blood piece by piece was an extremely painful thing!

It wasn’t just a matter of flesh and blood. He wanted to tear apart his body of the Void Dragon God.

The energy contained in the body of the Void Dragon God was much more than that of the other attributes!

“Time is running out!”

Wang Xian could feel the surrounding energy attacking him.

He had to resist it all the time.

At this moment, he had to modify his body. It was too late for him!

“Damn it, I can’t do it at all!”

“I don’t have enough time!”

Although Wang Xian had some confidence in modifying his body, he couldn’t withstand the attack of the surrounding energy in such a short period of time!

He gritted his teeth and took out a fruit.

This was a wood-attributed fruit that contained a huge amount of vitality!

This was a burning fruit.

It was a fruit that was born from the heaven-bestowed ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin.

There were only eight fruits in total, and heaven-bestowed one to him!

The burning fruit could turn his surroundings into a forest.

In this forest, all the trees could provide Wang Xian with a huge amount of vitality.

As long as the forest was not destroyed, he would not die.

During this period of time, any injuries that he suffered could be healed quickly!

At this moment, Wang Xian could only take out the burning fruit!

He could use the burning fruit to support himself for a while.

Buzz

He swallowed the burning fruit directly into his stomach. At the position around him, trees were formed one by one.

These trees helped him withstand the attacks of the Elemental God’s energy!

He seized this time to quickly transform his body and tear it apart.

The spatial attribute had the strongest wrapping effect, so he used space as his body.

He used the other nine attributes as his internal organs!

This was the result of the research of the spirit kneader!

Now, Wang Xian was using it on his body!

Intense pain was felt. Fortunately, he had the energy from burning the fruit, which reduced his pain by a lot.

“Burning the fruit can last for one minute.”

Wang Xian had a feeling in his heart. He quickly brought his body to a balanced state!

His flesh and blood flowed into the surroundings and was quickly melted by the surrounding energy.

Wang Xian’s transformation was also carried out quickly!
